I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/encode/starlette.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Start with a Python base image
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install the dependencies from requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Install any other required dependencies as specified in README.md
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir starlette[full]

# Run the test suite to ensure everything is set up correctly
RUN pytest
